comments.body: we should add an error return value instead
Ok, we have some more already below. Nothing new.
This is too small to be a separate commit :)
The deprecation plan in design doc is to announce deprecation in 1.10, redirect old endpoint to new endpoint in 1.11, and remove old endpoint (and probably return a deprecation message) in 1.12
`c` is only for one of the servers in a delegation chain. What about the others? They also have webservices we have to consider (btw, the same for swagger).

Compare `cmd/kube-apiserver/app/server.go:141`. If you want to test that the chain is properly considered in the openapi setup, `cmd/kube-apiserver/app/testing/server_test.go` might be a good place to add a test.

odd signature, installing and returning something.
